context.p: Eucalyptus offers installation checks for anye Eucalyptus component or service (CLC, Walrus, SC, NC, SC, services, and more). When Eucalyptus encounters an error, it presents the problem to the operator. These checks are used for install-time problems. They provide resolutions to some of the fault conditions.
Each problematic condition contains the following information:

row.entry: Where to go to fix the fault
The steps to take to resolve the fault

context.p: For more information about all the faults we support, go to https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucalyptus/tree/testing/util/faults/en_US.
